original_text: How we believe in God is also like that. If our faith does not lead us to do good things, then it is not worth anything. It is dead!
korean_text: 이와 같이 행함이 없는 믿음은 그 자체가 죽은 것이라

sentences.original_text: How we believe in God is also like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 하나님을 믿는 방식도 그와 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: If our faith does not lead us to do good things,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 우리의 믿음이 선한 일을 하도록 이끌지 않는다면,

sentences.original_text: then it is not worth anything.
